MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The storm crow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: magic missile 1/day: haste

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the malphas has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Night Terror (1/round)
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action immediately after making a successful melee attack, a malphas storm crow can cast magic missile through his or her sword at the same target.

MonsterTrait.Name: Swordtrained
MonsterTrait.Text: Malphas are trained from youth in combat. They are proficient with all martial melee and ranged weapons.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The malphas makes three longsword attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Longsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shadow Call
MonsterTrait.Text: A malphas can cast magic missile as a reaction when it is hit by a ranged weapon attack.
